resourceGroup: String -[Azure Resource Group Name - New or Existing]
region: String -[Azure Region to Deploy, example: eastus]
workspace: String -[Name of Azure Machine Learning workspace to create or attach to]
batch_vm_size: String = [SKU name of the machines to create in a NEW cluster]
batch_vm_min: int = [Minimum Number of running VMs in a NEW cluster]
batch_vm_max: int = [Maximum Number of VMs to add in a NEW cluster]
source_container: String = [Azure Storage container for source data file.]
result_container: String = [Azure Storage container for results data file.]
data_files: String = [Comma separated list of files to upload to source_container stored in data_folder]
result_file: String = [File name for results file from batch job]
schedule_frequency: String = [Schedule pipeline frequency, i.e. Hourly, etc]
batch_script: String = [Pyhon file to run on batch cluster.]
